The Window Menu

The Window menu contains menu is only visible when RText is set to the MDI view style. It contains the following menu items:


Cascades all open text documents' windows.
Action What It Does
Tile Vertically Tiles all open text documents' windows vertically.
Tile Horizontally Tiles all open text documents' windows horizontally.
Cascade

Besides this, it also contains menu items for all open text documents, allowing you to switch active documents easily.

See also: The Menu Bar
